Title:
Neopolystigma gen. nov., type genus of the new family
Neopolystigmataceae
Keywords:
Andira humilis, Brazil, Cerrado, Phyllachorales,
Polystigma, Polystigmataceae, Stigmatula, Xylariales.
Abstract:
 One new species of a Polystigma-like fungus on Andira
humilis (Fabaceae) from the Brazilian Cerrado is described and compared
with Polystigma sensu stricto (Polystigmataceae/Xylariales) and
Polystigma sensu lato (Phyllachoraceae).  Phylogeny using LSU, SSU, and
ITS allocates the new species together with Polystigma pusillum in
Phyllachorales, apart from the Polystigmataceae (Xylariales).  The
combination of Polystigma pusillum into Neopolystigma pusillum is
proposed.  The new family Neopolystigmataceae is described to
accommodate the new species, together with N. pusillum.  Morphological
and ecological characteristics of Polystigma sensu lato, Stigmatula, and
Fremitomyces species are discussed.
